mil7.8.6:5.1: “Bhante nāgasena, ‘bhojanassa tīṇi aṅgāni gahetabbānī’ti yaṃ vadesi, katamāni tāni tīṇi aṅgāni gahetabbānī”ti?
mil7.8.6:5.3: evameva kho, mahārāja, yoginā yogāvacarena sabbasattānaṃ maggupatthambhena bhavitabbaṃ.
mil7.8.6:5.4: Idaṃ, mahārāja, bhojanassa paṭhamaṃ aṅgaṃ gahetabbaṃ.
mil7.8.6:6.1: Puna caparaṃ, mahārāja, bhojanaṃ sabbasattānaṃ balaṃ vaḍḍheti;
mil7.8.6:6.2: evameva kho, mahārāja, yoginā yogāvacarena puññavaḍḍhiyā vaḍḍhitabbaṃ.
mil7.8.6:6.3: Idaṃ, mahārāja, bhojanassa dutiyaṃ aṅgaṃ gahetabbaṃ.
mil7.8.6:7.1: Puna caparaṃ, mahārāja, bhojanaṃ sabbasattānaṃ abhipatthitaṃ;
mil7.8.6:7.2: evameva kho, mahārāja, yoginā yogāvacarena sabbalokābhipatthitena bhavitabbaṃ.
mil7.8.6:7.3: Idaṃ, mahārāja, bhojanassa tatiyaṃ aṅgaṃ gahetabbaṃ.
